data.title: Hamas war — News
data.text:
The seemingly endless conflict in the Middle East, which has erupted again into full-fledged war between Hamas and Israel, involves not just opposing governments and their armed forces, but millions of people who, like all of us, want only to live in peace. It’s easy to take sides and to see those we oppose as an abstract “other”, but they are human beings as well, with much the same hopes and dreams as us.

To say the situation is longstanding and complex would be an understatement; the roots of this conflict go back more than 150 years, and involve not just the Israeli Jews and Arab Muslims, but geopolitical players around the world. And while both “sides” can make claim to the moral high-ground, neither is entirely blameless for the crisis that exists.

Rather than seek evidence for whom to fault, we think the best course that we, as individuals can take, is to learn more about the people who are caught up in this war. To that end, we’ve begun to collect books, videos, movies and podcasts we think will help us to better understand both sides, and the humanity of those involved. We encourage you to share your suggestions. You can do this by sending as an email at duxburyforall@gmail.com

Novels, short stories and memoirs

About Palestinians:

Pay No Heed to Rockets: Life ion Contemporary Palestine by Marcello Di Cintio

In the Presence of Absence by Mahmoud Darwish

Salt Houses by Hala Alyan

Palestine’s Children: Returning to Hair and Other Stories by Ghassan Kanafani

The Drone Eats with Me: A Gaza Diary by Ate Abu Seif

The Book of Gaza: A City in Short Fiction by Ate Abu Seif

Palestinian Walks: Forays into a Vanishing Landscape by Raja Shehadeh

Haifa Fragments by Khulud Khamis

I Saw Ramallah by Mourid Bhargouti

About Israelis:

Khirbet Khizeh by S.Y. Yizhar

The Hilltop by Assaf Gavron

The People of Forever Are Not Afraid by Shani Boianjiu

Twenty-One Stories by S. Y Agnon

Suddenly, A Knock at the Door by Etgar Keret

Apples from the Desert by Savyon Liebrecht

Front the Four Winds by Haim Sabato

To the End of the Land by David Grossman

A Tale of Love and Darkness by Amos Oz

Historical works about Israel, Palestine and the conflict between them

Sacred Landscapes: The Buried History of the Holy Land since 1948 by Meron Benvenisti

The Israel-Palestine Conflict: Contested Histories by Neil Caplan

Citizen Strangers: Palestinians and the Birth of Israels Liberal Settler State by Shira Robinson

Scars of War, Wounds of Peace: The Israeli-Arab Tragedy by Shlomo Ben Ami

Lives in Common: Arabs and Jews in Jerusalem, Jaffa and Hebron by Menachem Klein

Failing Peace: Gaza and the Palestinian-Israeli Conflict By Sarah Roy

Israel: A Simple Guide to the Most Misunderstood Country on Earth by Noa Tishby

Killing a King: The Assassination of Yitzhak Rabin and the Remaking of Israel By Dan Ephron

The Hundred Years' War on Palestine: A History of Settler Colonialism and Resistance by Rashid Khalid

Israel: A Concise History of a Nation Reborn by Daniel Gordis

Palestine: A Four Thousand Year History by Nur Mashal

My Promised Land: The Triumph and Tragedy of Israel by Ari Shavit

Podcasts

Plain Speak with Derek Thompson: Two Israel-Palestine Historians Explain: How Did We Get Here? And What Happens Next?:

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/two-israel-palestine-historians-explain-how-did-we/id1594471023?i=1000633266888

The Times of Israel: Seeing through the fog of war https://www.timesofisrael.com/spotlight/seeing-through-the-fog-of-war/

Al Jazeera’s The Take: Israel’s ground war on Gaza begins: https://www.aljazeera.com/podcasts/2023/10/30/the-take-israels-ground-war-on-gaza-begins

NPR: Why Is It So Hard To Talk About The Israeli-Palestinian Conflict?: https://www.npr.org/2021/05/24/999923328/why-is-it-so-hard-to-talk-about-the-israeli-palestinian-conflict

BBC: Israel and The Palestinians: Part 1 The Palestinians https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m001rv11

BBC: Israel and The Palestinians: Part 2 Israel https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m001rrry

BBC: Israel and The Palestinians: Part 3 Hamas https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m001rv0y

Unsettled: A collection of podcasts featuring difficult conversations and diverse viewpoints on Israel-Palestine and the Jewish diaspora https://www.unsettledpod.com

Player FM: Palestinian Israeli Conflict Podcasts https://player.fm/podcasts/Palestinian%2520Israeli%2520Conflict
